questions.question: What is 4fly and who is it for?
questions.answer: 4fly is a comprehensive software solution designed to simplify and optimize flying club management. It caters to flying clubs of all sizes, whether affiliated with aviation authorities or not, seeking to automate and centralize their daily operations. Our goal is to support your club's growth.

questions.question: How does the pricing model work?
questions.answer: Our model is simple: free up to 1000 flight hours per year, then €0.50 per flight hour on total hours. For large clubs exceeding 3000 annual hours, we offer custom plans. All features are included from the start.

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees?
questions.answer: No, our flight hour-based pricing is completely transparent. All essential features are included in this rate. Some additional services, such as credit card payment, are offered as options based on your needs.

questions.question: What features are included?
questions.answer: All essential features are included in the base offer: reservation management, maintenance, training, accounting... Additional services like credit card payment are available as options for clubs that want them.

questions.question: What support is available?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive technical support via email and phone, included for all clubs regardless of size. Our team is available to help with initial setup and answer your daily questions.

questions.question: How does the reservation system work?
questions.answer: The booking system is available 24/7 online. Members can reserve an aircraft, view real-time availability, and manage their bookings from their smartphone or computer.

questions.question: Can you book multiple slots in advance?
questions.answer: Yes, you can make multiple reservations according to your club's rules. The system automatically checks for conflicts and required qualifications.

questions.question: How are instruction flights managed?
questions.answer: Instruction flights can be scheduled with available instructors. The system automatically checks instructor and aircraft availability.

questions.question: What happens in case of cancellation?
questions.answer: Cancellations are managed according to your club's rules. The system can send automatic notifications to concerned parties and free up the slot for other reservations.

questions.question: How is aircraft maintenance tracked?
questions.answer: 4fly includes a complete maintenance tracking system that monitors flight hours, cycles, and calendar deadlines. Automatic alerts are sent for upcoming maintenance.

questions.question: Who can declare maintenance?
questions.answer: Mechanics and authorized personnel can record maintenance operations. Each intervention is documented and archived in the aircraft's history.

questions.question: How are maintenance alerts managed?
questions.answer: The system sends automatic notifications to managers when maintenance is approaching. Pilots are also informed of aircraft limitations or unavailability.

questions.question: Can maintenance types be customized?
questions.answer: Yes, you can define custom maintenance types according to your needs, with intervals based on flight hours, cycles, or calendar.

questions.question: How are students tracked?
questions.answer: Each student has a digital progress book. Instructors can track their progress, note completed exercises, and plan upcoming lessons.

questions.question: Can the training program be customized?
questions.answer: Yes, training programs are fully customizable according to your needs. You can create different curricula for PPL, LAPL, or other qualifications.

questions.question: How are theoretical exams managed?
questions.answer: The platform includes a quiz and theoretical exam module. Instructors can create tests, track results, and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question: Can students track their progress?
questions.answer: Yes, each student has access to their personal space where they can track their progress, review courses, and prepare for exams.

questions.question: How are memberships managed?
questions.answer: 4fly allows you to manage memberships, dues, and licenses. Automatic reminders are sent for renewals.

questions.question: Can different member types be defined?
questions.answer: Yes, you can create different profiles (student, pilot, instructor, mechanic, etc.) with specific access rights.

questions.question: How are member documents managed?
questions.answer: All documents (licenses, medical certificates, qualifications) are stored digitally, and the system automatically alerts of upcoming expirations.

questions.question: How do online payments work?
questions.answer: 4fly integrates a secure credit card payment system. Members can top up their account and pay for flights directly from the platform.

questions.question: What financial reports are available?
questions.answer: The platform generates detailed reports on flights, payments, and accounting. You can export this data for your accounting.

questions.question: How are invoices managed?
questions.answer: Invoices are automatically generated after each flight or payment. They are digitally archived and can be sent by email.

questions.question: How is data protected?
questions.answer: All data is stored securely and encrypted. We comply with GDPR standards and ensure regular backups.

questions.question: Who has access to club data?
questions.answer: Data access is strictly controlled through a permissions system. Only authorized persons can access sensitive information.

questions.question: Can we export our data?
questions.answer: Yes, you can export your data at any time in standard formats (CSV, Excel). We also facilitate migration from other systems.

questions.question: How is service continuity ensured?
questions.answer: Our infrastructure is hosted on redundant servers with high availability. We perform daily backups of all data.

saint-exupery-1.text: The airplane is not an end in itself, it is a means. One does not risk their life for a plane: just as a farmer does not plow for his plow. But through the airplane, one leaves the cities and their accountants, and discovers a peasant truth.
saint-exupery-1.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

saint-exupery-2.text: The earth teaches us more about ourselves than all the books. Because it resists us. Man discovers himself when he measures himself against the obstacle.
saint-exupery-2.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

guillaumet-1.text: What saves us is taking one step. Then another. It is always the same step, but you have to take it.
guillaumet-1.author: Henri Guillaumet

dassault-1.text: A beautiful airplane is one that flies well.
dassault-1.author: Marcel Dassault

saint-exupery-3.text: In the air, nothing holds the bird up except its own will not to fall.
saint-exupery-3.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

mermoz-1.text: I saw the face of God. It was in the clouds, in the wind, in the stars. I saw it in the sky.
mermoz-1.author: Jean Mermoz

guillaumet-2.text: The most beautiful of all journeys is the one we haven't taken yet.
guillaumet-2.author: Henri Guillaumet

dassault-2.text: The airplane is perhaps the most beautiful machine man has ever created. It's the closest to living beings.
dassault-2.author: Marcel Dassault

garros-1.text: Air is a thick fluid in which we can sculpt solid shapes.
garros-1.author: Roland Garros

daurat-1.text: When you fly above the clouds, you understand why birds sing.
daurat-1.author: Didier Daurat

bleriot-1.text: Flight is a perpetual victory that we win over gravity.
bleriot-1.author: Louis Blériot

lindbergh-1.text: Aviation is a demanding mistress. She doesn't forgive mistakes, but she rewards passion.
lindbergh-1.author: Charles Lindbergh

mermoz-2.text: In the sky, there are no roads. There are only stars and dreams.
mermoz-2.author: Jean Mermoz

boucher-1.text: Flying might be getting a little closer to the angels.
boucher-1.author: Hélène Boucher

guillaumet-3.text: The pilot who isn't afraid is a dead pilot. Courage is about mastering your fear.
guillaumet-3.author: Henri Guillaumet

article1.content: These terms and conditions of sale govern the use of the 4fly platform, a management solution for flying clubs. These conditions apply to the exclusion of all other conditions.

article2.title: Article 2 - Services
article2.content:
4fly offers a comprehensive management platform including:
- Aircraft booking management
- Maintenance tracking
- Training management
- Member administration
- Billing and payments
- Communication tools

article3.title: Article 3 - Pricing
article3.content:
4fly offers three pricing plans adapted to your activity:

1. Starter Plan (Free):
- For clubs up to 1000 flight hours per year
- Access to all features
- Email support

2. Growth Plan (€0.50/flight hour excl. VAT):
- For clubs from 1000 to 3000 flight hours per year
- All features included
- Priority support

3. Performance Plan (Custom):
- For clubs over 3000 flight hours per year
- All features included
- Custom hosting
- On-site training
- 24/7 VIP support
- Dedicated account manager

article4.content:

The user commits to:
